entry.title: Meet Hydrogen: A React Framework For Dynamic, Contextual And Personalized E-Commerce
entry.summary: A great commerce experience is not a Lighthouse score or a set of Core Web Vitals figures (although both are important inputs), but it’s also a trilemma that carefully balances competing needs of delivering a great customer experience, dynamic storefront capabilities and long-term business objectives.
